uuid.description: Universally unique identifier (UUID) for the worklog entry.

assignment_id.description: Unique identifier for the assignment associated with the worklog.

project_id.description: Unique identifier for the project associated with the work performed.

starts_at.description: Timestamp when the work associated with the worklog started.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the worklog was created.

work.description: Details of the work performed, such as hours worked, tasks completed, etc.

desc.description: Description or notes related to the work performed.

in_progress.description: Indicates if the work is currently in progress or completed.

billable.description: Indicates if the work logged is billable or not.

developer_id.description: Unique identifier for the developer who logged the work.

custom_attributes.description: Additional custom attributes or metadata related to the worklog.
